name: Walking in the park
description:
Are you tired of this endless day? why don't you download this game and relax 15 minutes exploring and cleaning the park while you're listening relaxing lo-fi music.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Pick soda can: E

Drop soda can: Put the soda in the trash can

Info: I

Thanks for downloading! any support will be well received :)
